tool_description: Creates, validates, and manages backup retention policies with rules for different backup types, database systems, and retention periods.

policy_name.description: Unique name for the retention policy

database_type.description: Target database type (mysql, postgresql, mongodb, oracle, sqlserver, all)

full_backup_retention_days.description: Retention period for full backups in days (1-3650)

incremental_backup_retention_days.description: Retention period for incremental backups in days (1-365)

log_backup_retention_days.description: Retention period for log backups in days (1-90)

min_backups_to_keep.description: Minimum number of backups to always retain (1-100)

archive_before_delete.description: Whether to archive backups before deletion

policy_priority.description: Policy priority level (1-10, higher = more priority)

exclude_patterns.description: File patterns to exclude from this policy

business_hours_only.description: Only apply cleanup during business hours (9AM-5PM)

dry_run_mode.description: Enable dry run mode for testing without actual changes

error_messages: Invalid retention period: full_backup_retention_days must be 1-3650, incremental_backup_retention_days must be 1-365, log_backup_retention_days must be 1-90.
Policy name conflict: A policy with this name already exists. Choose a unique policy_name.
Invalid database type: Use one of [mysql, postgresql, mongodb, oracle, sqlserver, all].
Invalid parameter ranges: min_backups_to_keep must be 1-100, policy_priority must be 1-10.
Exclude patterns limit exceeded: Maximum 20 exclude patterns allowed.
usage: Create retention policies by specifying policy_name, database_type, and retention periods for different backup types. Configure additional options like minimum backups to keep and archival settings.

policy_id.description: Unique identifier assigned to the created policy

policy_status.description: Current status of the policy (active, inactive, draft)

estimated_impact.description: Estimated impact summary if policy were applied
